unlockHelpButton.defaultError:
**Functional Purpose**: Default error message for unlocking help
**UI Location**: Track page, within the help unlock section
**When Users See This**: If an unexpected error occurs during the 'unlock help' process.
**Technical Context**: Used as the default message for the ErrorBoundary.
**Current English**: "There was an error unlocking help, please try again!"
unlockHelpButton.unlockThisTab:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text for unlocking a help tab
**UI Location**: Track page, in the help unlock section
**When Users See This**: When viewing a locked help tab and needing to unlock it
**Technical Context**: Standard text on a button
**Current English**: "Unlock this tab"
